local.server
Class Redirect

java.lang.Object
  |

        +--local.server.Registrar

              +--local.server.Redirect
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.zoolu.sip.provider.SipProviderListener
public class Redirect
extends Registrar

Class Redirect implement a SIP edirect server. It extends class Registrar. A Redirect can work as simply SIP redirect, or it can handle calls for registered users.
